review: A little disappointed that it could not connect to my AV unit though as that controls all my devices. However, with my Harmony One it really did not matter. I thought at first it was defective as it showed video and heavy snow when attempting to connect it directly to the AV unit. However, after I contact amazon support, they were wonderful. It got set quickly and easily. It seems to work flawlessly. I had been using the Amazon app on my PS4 and my TV, but this is well worth the price and better than those apps! The PS4 app, I have a fundamental issue with using the remote. Sony prevented the Harmony One from using it and I refused to use the game controller (personal choice). The TV app did not buffer so I was, at best getting an SD feed with lots of pauses. This stick does the trick! I love it. An even with the initial setup, there is probably technical issues with direct connect to an AV unit instead of the TV. I still get the full featured sound through the optical cable from my TV to my AV unit.
